description: B.Rule is a Business Rule Engine that allows you to write sophisticated business rules to keep your code clean and structured. Supports both synchronous and asynchronous execution. But most importantly it does this in a very simple and elegant way. You don't need to invest so much of your precious time to learn a whole new framework. All you get is an abstract class and couple of simple interfaces...
releaseNotes:
Adding/Getting data between rules simplified. Added two metho
ds TryAdd(string key, object value) and TryGetValue(string key). Data property
no longer available.
